reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Supporting the Islamic Republic of Mauritania with preventive medical equipment and supplies to confront the emerging corona virus (Covid-19) within the group of 26 countries

description.narrative: Providing preventive medical supplies to the Ministry of Health in Mauritania to confront the emerging corona virus, Covid-19
Reducing the spread of the emerging corona virus, supporting the health sector in facing the corona virus, and strengthening health services in combating its spread

The health sector continues to provide curative and preventive services to (905,200 beneficiaries) of health sector workers and citizens, educating citizens in dealing with the pandemic, taking preventive precautions and limiting the spread of the Corona virus.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
